document_data.name: Rogue's Morsel
document_data.mainbody: '''Rogue's morsel''' was a species of edible [[mushroom]]s found in close proximity to [[tree]]s, hiding in their shadows.
document_data.Description:
These small grey mushrooms had a reputation of helping [[rogue]]s on the run to survive while hiding in the forests. They filled the bellies of those close to the ground, both [[humanoids]] and forest [[beast]]s.

Rogue's morsels were valued at five [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
document_data.Usages: Sweet-smelling salts of rogue's morsel, [[alchemically]] extracted out of the mushrooms' dried gills cold be mixed with a special type of suspension to brew a basic ''[[healing potion]]''.
